channel.title: Cache downloader
channel.description:
my cachedownloader doensn't extract the whole cache..
it only extracts the [b]main_file_cache.idx[/b] files.. My downloadlink is correct.
If I extract the cache by my self the client is working..
But without this I'm not able to make a .jar
The only "error??" I get in my client.bat =
[code]Exception [NumberFormatException][/code]
The compiler gives no errors.

item.title: Cache downloader
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

Actually it’s still possible to have a jar without a autocachedownloader as my servers downloadable client doesn’t have one.

Make sure your cachedownloader.java download link is dl.dropbox.com/

Make sure you zip the files and folders INSIDE your cache.

Read full topic
